mapper.sql: SELECT pro_id, pro_university, pro_grad_school, pro_office_phone_num, pro_laboratory_phone_num, major_id,office_id,laboratory_id FROM professor
mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_university, p.pro_grad_school, p.pro_office_phone_num, p.pro_laboratory_phone_num, p.major_id, p.office_id, p.laboratory_id, u.users_id, u.users_password, u.users_name, u.users_eng_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email, u.users_phone_num, u.users_cell_num, u.users_national, u.users_current_addr, u.users_born_addr, u.users_enable, u.users_photo FROM professor p, users u WHERE p.pro_id = u.users_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}

SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_university, p.pro_grad_school, p.pro_office_phone_num, u.users_id, u.users_password, u.users_name, u.users_eng_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email, u.users_phone_num, u.users_cell_num, u.users_national, u.users_current_addr, u.users_born_addr, u.users_enable, u.users_photo FROM professor p, users u WHERE p.pro_id = u.users_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}
SELECT p.pro_id, u.users_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email FROM professor p, users u WHERE p.pro_id = u.users_id AND u.users_name Like '%'||#{value}||'%'

SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_university, p.pro_grad_school, p.pro_office_phone_num, p.pro_laboratory_phone_num, u.users_id, u.users_password, u.users_name, u.users_eng_name, u.users_rrn, u.users_email, u.users_phone_num, u.users_cell_num, u.users_national, u.users_current_addr, u.users_born_addr, u.users_enable, u.users_photo FROM professor p, users u WHERE p.pro_id = u.users_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}
SELECT m.major_name, m.major_id FROM professor p, major m WHERE p.major_id = m.major_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}
SELECT r.room_name, b.building_name, p.office_id, b.building_id FROM professor p, room r, building b WHERE p.office_id = r.room_id AND b.building_id = r.building_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}
SELECT r.room_name, b.building_name, p.laboratory_id, b.building_id FROM professor p, room r, building b WHERE p.laboratory_id = r.room_id AND b.building_id = r.building_id AND p.pro_id = #{value}
SELECT r.room_name, b.building_name, p.office_id FROM professor p, room r, building b WHERE p.office_id = r.room_id AND b.building_id = r.building_id AND b.building_name = '교수실강의동'
SELECT r.room_name, b.building_name, p.laboratory_id FROM professor p, room r, building b WHERE p.laboratory_id = r.room_id AND b.building_id = r.building_id AND b.building_name = '연구실강의동'
